medium: Linen; needle lace (Brussels Point de Gaze & Alençon)
title: Lappet
description: Lappet with collar attached, of Brussels Point de Gaze needlepoint lace. Lappet has border on bothe sides of reses and leaves enclosing, toward the ends, a design simulating a jabot; and terminating in a close spray of lilacs (?) and one large floral spray with petals and leaves appliquéd. Collar has a border of open-work shells above which is running floral designs surmounted by small dots.
